accounts.name: Automation
docs: Automation parameters for automated mining deployments.

accounts.name: Board
docs: Global round tracking for the mining game.

accounts.name: Config
docs: Program configuration state.

accounts.name: Miner
docs: Tracks a miner's deployed SOL and reward balances.

accounts.name: Round
docs: State for a single mining round.

accounts.name: Stake
docs: State for a staking participant.

accounts.name: Treasury
docs: Singleton treasury account tracking protocol balances.

instructions.name: automate
docs: Configures or closes a miner automation account.
Automation PDA seeds: ["automation", signer].
Miner PDA seeds: ["miner", signer].

instructions.name: checkpoint
docs: Settles miner rewards for a completed round.
Treasury PDA seeds: ["treasury"].

instructions.name: claimSol
docs: Claims SOL rewards from the miner account.

instructions.name: claimOre
docs: Claims ORE token rewards from the treasury vault.

instructions.name: close
docs: Closes an expired round account and returns rent to the payer.
Round PDA seeds: ["round", round_id].
Treasury PDA seeds: ["treasury"].

instructions.name: deploy
docs: Deploys SOL to selected squares for the current round.
Automation PDA seeds: ["automation", authority].
Config PDA seeds: ["config"].
Miner PDA seeds: ["miner", authority].
Round PDA seeds: ["round", board.round_id].

instructions.name: log
docs: Emits an arbitrary log message from the board PDA.
Bytes following the discriminator are logged verbatim.

instructions.name: reset
docs: Finalizes the current round, mints rewards, and opens the next round.
Board PDA seeds: ["board"].
Treasury PDA seeds: ["treasury"].
Round PDA seeds: ["round", board.round_id] and ["round", board.round_id + 1].

instructions.name: deposit
docs: Deposits ORE into a staking account.
Stake PDA seeds: ["stake", signer].

instructions.name: withdraw
docs: Withdraws ORE from a staking account.
Stake PDA seeds: ["stake", signer].

instructions.name: claimYield
docs: Claims accrued staking rewards.
Stake PDA seeds: ["stake", signer].
Treasury PDA seeds: ["treasury"].

instructions.name: buyback
docs: Buys back ORE from the market.

instructions.name: bury
docs: Swaps vaulted SOL for ORE via a CPI and burns the proceeds.
Treasury PDA seeds: ["treasury"].
Additional swap accounts are passed through as remaining accounts.

instructions.name: wrap
docs: Wraps SOL held by the treasury into WSOL for swapping.
Treasury PDA seeds: ["treasury"].

instructions.name: setAdmin
docs: Updates the program admin address.

instructions.name: newVar
docs: Creates a new entropy var account through the entropy program.

instructions.name: reloadSol
docs: Reloads SOL into the automation account.

instructions.name: compoundYield
docs: Compounds staking yield.

instructions.name: liq
docs: Liquidation instruction.

types.name: Numeric
docs: Fixed-point helper backed by I80F48 from the steel crate.

docs: Automation parameters for automated mining deployments.

docs: Global round tracking for the mining game.

types.name: Config
docs: Program configuration state.

types.name: Miner
docs: Tracks a miner's deployed SOL and reward balances.

types.name: Round
docs: State for a single mining round.

types.name: Stake
docs: State for a staking participant.

types.name: Treasury
docs: Singleton treasury account tracking protocol balances.
